| script |
| $initial= | is | storeAttribute | on | !-css=div.progress__line@style-! |
| $text1= | is | storeText | on | text=*%* |
| ensure | do | click | on | text=Задать случайное значение |
| $final= | is | storeAttribute | on | !-css=div.progress__line@style-! |
| $text2= | is | storeText | on | text=*%* |
| ensure | do | verifyEval | on | "$final"!="$initial" | with | true |
| ensure | do | verifyEval | on | "$text1"!="$text2" | with | true |
| ensure | do | click | on | text=Задать значение: * |
| do | verifyNotVisible | on | text=*%* |
